properties.style: padding-bottom: 56.25%; position: relative; height: 0; overflow: hidden;margin: 0

children.value: We exhibited our installation as part of the
, the Street Art Festival of Lyon, France.

During the 10 days of exhibition we received more than 40 thousand drawings from thousands of participants of all ages.
Street Artists from the festival also used our tool for live performances alongside the public.

frontmatter.title: Peinture Fraiche Festival
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative Artwork
frontmatter.description: The Live Drawing Project installation for the Peinture Fraiche Festival 2019 in Lyon, collaborative artwork.
